live on.translation[0].definitions[0].de: if something lives on, it continues to exist
live on.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to have a particular amount of money to buy food and other necessary things
live on.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: I don’t know how they manage to live on £55 a week.
the number of families who live on benefits
live on.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to eat a lot of a particular type of food
live on.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: They live on bread and potatoes.
He practically lives on fish and chips!
